Reviews.Title: “Great location & cheap for Hollywood!”
Reviews.Author: moss87
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 ago boyfriend decided la booked exactly lobby looks fantastic little dated probably round refurbishing soon overall nice stay hollywood walk fame drive 1015 minutes cleaned everyday nice pool sunbathing underground parking secure free amazing stay wouldnt recommend didnt spend ridiculous amounts accommodation shopping definitely worth staying
